review_text: App crashes every time I try to export my data. This started after the latest update. Please fix ASAP! Using Samsung Galaxy S21, Android 13.
URGENT: App deletes my notes randomly. Lost important meeting notes. OnePlus 11, Android 14. Steps: 1) Create note 2) Add images 3) Close app 4) Reopen - note is gone!
Please add voice-to-text feature. Would make note-taking so much faster during meetings.
Best update yet! The new features are exactly what I needed. Keep up the great work!
